attributes.action: No to chequers deal, yes to no deal.
attributes.additional_details:
We the British people call for a complete block on the prime ministers chequers deal.
It is a deal that keeps us tied to the European Union. We did not vote for this option. We voted to leave and leave we must. 
With this plan we will remain governed with no power of say in the EU which is absolutely disastrous for British people, business and law. 
So we must push for a no deal Brexit and make our way as we did before.
attributes.background: The prime ministers chequers plan is not Brexit, we the British people voted to either remain or leave the EU. We had a two answer choice, there was no option to half remain.
